entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
